law.catch_line: In a circuit court, an arrest warrant shall be issued on a form that:...

text.section:
After a judge issues an arrest warrant, the judge shall:
Maintain a copy for the judge's file; and
Provide a copy for:
The clerk of the circuit court;
The sheriff or other law enforcement officer who will be serving the warrant; and
The person for whom the warrant is issued.
Failure to use the form described in this section does not have any effect on an otherwise lawful arrest.
